generated_doNotEdit.title: Weapon
generated_doNotEdit.description: Weapon Item Component. Added to every weapon item such as axe, sword, trident, bow, crossbow.

fields.title: on_hurt_entity
fields.description: Trigger for letting you know when this item is used to hurt another mob

fields.title: on_not_hurt_entity
fields.description: Trigger for letting you know when this item hit another actor, but didn't do damage

fields.title: on_hit_block
fields.description: Trigger for letting you know when this item is used to hit a block
